website_summaries.verdict: A more affordable masticating juicer that’s easy to clean, offers quiet operation, and includes multiple nozzles.
pros: Features 80 RPM for a slower speed that provides more nutrient-dense juice
Operation is quieter than most other juicers
Ejects pulp automatically for easier cleaning
Includes 6 nozzles and a juicing screen, as well as a 15-year warranty
cons: Doesn’t work as well if you want to make large quantities of juice

customer_reviews.title: Easy Easy cleanup and reassembly
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is supposed to, most other reviews cover this well. Easy Easy cleanup and reassembly. Only downsides for me; As many others have said the feed chute is quite small so be prepared to pre slice items and exhibit a bit of patience. This type of juicer does not like mushy fruits and veggies. If your apple/cucumber etc. is anything less than crisp and ripe it will create mush in the cylinder that you hopefully have enough firm fruits and veggies to help clear. Great juices can be made and it handles leafy greens and wheatgrass like a CHAMP. Overall a great Juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L Huff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing juicer
customer_reviews.text: We use it twice a week and love it. It's easy to clean, quick to assemble and take apart, and makes an impressive amount of juice. I love how quiet it is because I can still juice while my youngest naps. Customer service is also amazing. It's a great way to introduce vegetables to a picky eater's palate. My juice is almost entirely veggies, but for my kids I make a juice blend from 8 carrots, 2 green apples, half a lemon, and some ginger and it's very well received. I plan on eventually adding cucumber, then spinach or kale once I feel like they will be willing to drink it. :)
customer_reviews.author: anon87

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I love this juicer. It really does the job extracting as much juice as possible, I bought it to replace a centrifugal juicer and it extracts significantly more juice, the pulp is practically dry. I didn't realize when I bought it that it has attachments for making pasta, nut milks and nut butters. I haven't used it for that yet but I plan to. I highly recommend this juicer, I honestly couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Diane N

customer_reviews.title: Excellent juicer!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful juicer! Since i got it i have juiced almost every day. The pulp produced is very dry indicating the maximum amount of juice was extracted. Quick and easy clean up! I used to avoid juicing bc i dreaded the tedious cleanup but this machine really makes it simple. The only screen to scrub is quite small and the stiff brush tool that comes with it makes it easy. The juice stays fresh longer than with the high speed juicers too. So glad i switched from the centrifugal breville juicer to this slow juicer!
customer_reviews.author: Waters

customer_reviews.title: I cannot be more disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: Last month I purchased a J8007 juicer. I cannot be more disappointed with this product. The only vegetables that I can use are carrots, beets and celeries. The pulp of cucumbers, apples, pineapples,etc. never go through the screen and end cap to be deposited in the pulp container. Two weeks ago, I called Omega customer service and the only solution that I was given was 'wash the screen in the dishwasher and leave the end cap at the most open position', recommendations that obviously didn't add any improvement on the juicer behavior. If the J8007 cannot juice apples, pineapples or cucumbers Omega/Amazon should prior warn customers. Please buy a juicer which could be used for juicing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS JUICER
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS JUICER! Made with quality material and with a 15 year warranty, this juicer is incredible! I have used it every day for over a month now and am in love! Yes, there is a steep price tag but for what your getting it is worth every penny! There is no price tag that can be put on your own health. It is able to juice anything I have put through it with ease. I have used many types of juicers and yes, masticating juicers take a fraction more time to "prep" the food but it delivers such incredible juice its worth it! Cant recommend this enough!
customer_reviews.author: Shayne S.

customer_reviews.title: Have used about 12 different juicers in my line of work and this is favorite so far
customer_reviews.text: So quiet, so easy to use, great instruction manual, don't mind the mindfulness needed to cut veggies small enough through chute, love that it works for all various greens and has easy to switch setting nob . Everything comes out dry after one juicing as others say. Really wonderful quality. Not too slow. Nice speed and quality. Clean up and put together is simple. Only concern is living in a wet and super damp climate some little rubber areas tucked into pieces that can't be removed may be hard to clean and dry and may collect mold around deep inner edges but will see.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Malina

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: The juicer worked great for the first 6months, but now it's clogging up all the time and my juices are coming out with lots of pulp! I called Customer Service about it and they said I have to pay to ship it back to them so they can take 5-6 weeks to try and fix the problem. Nope, I didn't dish out the cash to have this breakdown this early. NOT WORTH THE MONEY>
customer_reviews.author: LK in PA

customer_reviews.title: After 4 years... works as day one
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review after using this thing for four years. Everyday use with hard and soft fruits. Used to make ice cream from frozen fruits and also some pasta. Even for oranges. extracted everything just great. The waste was very dry, even juicy things like orange. Extract greens acceptably (I mean, an ordinary juice maker would never extract anything from kale).Extremely pleased with the product. Nothing has been broken, not a single accessory. However, due almost everything is plastic, it somewhat decolored and the clear plastics are cloudy. Doesn't seem clean anymore (and I do wash it every single time after each use). I guess that goes for plastics.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Don’t eat fruit after you eat your meal or before, eat it alone, whit 2 hours a least Difference even before or later and your
customer_reviews.text: works great its my best Investment, if put Four different colors of vegetables in your juicer, and Cook three different cereals like otmeal, millet, and rice, and you drink and eat this every day, you will see the big difference in your health, and your life, Almost in the next two weeks, that fast God bless
customer_reviews.author: Israel Avila

customer_reviews.title: NOT RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this juicer two years ago, and it arrived with consequential defects--it was smoking. The company replaced the product, which was great, but the replacement juicer has now begun leaking a thick, green oil and smells like smoke again during use. We are experienced juicers and have used basically every variety over many years. We researched for a month before investing in this one, and stuck with it even after that early hiccup. That said, we DO NOT RECOMMEND PURCHASING THIS PRODUCT. The warranty period will not cover the product life. Super disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Town & City Books

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: The Omega Juicer arrived in perfect condition with no visible damage to the shipping box! We have been researching for juicers for a while now and decided to go with the Omega brand. The Juicer is very powerful and worked as advertised. This juicer is very well made and I do believe it will last for a long time. Cleaning is very easy and straight forward. I'm thinking about buying another one for my mom on her birthday. I recommend this juicer!
customer_reviews.author: John J

customer_reviews.title: Mean green health machine
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is amazing. I juice a lot and the quality of the juice that comes out of this muscular info juicer is by far better than my old centrifugal one. The juicers feel richer and creamier. I was thinking of buying an upright masculating juicer, however I am not a fan of the foam in the juice. This one products minimal foaming despite being slower. This is a great machine to improve your health and I think everyone should own a slow juicer.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Juicer!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first juicer and I so glad I took the time to read reviews. This juice is AWESOME! Easy to clean. The pulp is dry which indicates that I am getting all the nutrients from the fruits and vegetables I am juicing. That is very important. It is also very quiet. It comes with other nozzles for making your own nut butter or noodles. Very versatile. I love it! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Shadden

customer_reviews.title: Tested this and it works better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Tested this and it works better than I expected. Juice outlet screen didn't get clogged before I had a good amount of juice. Easy to take off, cleaned with sink faucet spray and back on in very little time. I look forward to harvest season to make jams and jellies much faster than traditional method.
customer_reviews.author: T. McClanahan

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this juicer
customer_reviews.text: After reading countless reviews and comparisons, I picked this juicer to fit my needs. It was very reasonably priced compared to other juicers and I liked the long warranty. The packaging was great as it protected against damage. Set up, use and clean up is easy. I am very pleased with it's performance, the small feed tube is not a problem once you get used to how to feed all ingredients in properly to prevent jamming.(the reverse mode comes in handy for that) I appreciate how quiet it is and the pulp does come out very dry, ensuring the maximum yield of juice. I recommend this product to everyone who wants an affordable, efficient juicer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy to finally have a masticating slow juicer. only thing is i thought the waste would be drier so had to knock one star, but for the price point excellent buy. Its very easy to clean as well
customer_reviews.author: Regalo Alegria

customer_reviews.title: IT STARTED SMOKING THE FIRST TIME I USED IT
customer_reviews.text: YES, I cut the oranges up super small & yes I fed them in slowly! I'm really disappointed I read tons of great reviews I'm feeling like why me ???? I was so excited about this juicer I wanted to go with a good brand & this happened the first time in the middle of breakfast on a Sunday morning. of all days SUNDAY the customer service center isn't open. I had to rush my toddler out of the kitchen because before I knew it the whole kitchen was smoked out and smelt TERRRRRIBLE.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Hill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Juicer!
customer_reviews.text: Takes less time to clean than my last one. After reading the review from other people, I thought that it would take a long time to juice, but it doesn't. My other concern was the noise, but it isn't too loud, it just sounds like grinding. My last one sounded more like a blender. I do get more juice out of this juicer and very little food particles. The vegetable "meat" comes out very dry. I haven't used the strainer, because I haven't felt the need. My only complaint is that it doesn't do lettuce as well as everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: 2 Machines burned up after little use!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This machine burned up twice. The first time it happened we had used it 2 times. We only juice kale, spinach, and fruits. Omega replaced the first one with no hassles. The 2nd one burned up 5 minutes into using it. My gf and I followed all instructions and video tutorials. This machine is not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: I use this daily!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot believe the difference this juicer makes in my morning routine. So, so easy to clean! I don’t dread the process anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Macombmichigan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome more than a year later
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for at least a year and although I don't use it every day, it does get used and it's still functioning just fine. It's a fantastic juicer. Cleaning it after use is a bit of a pain in the neck but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherman Morrison

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this juicer
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this juicer, I use it at least once a day and it never fails me. I did have a little hiccup when I first received it, but the manufacturer was very quick to resolve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: coleycole99

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made and does a great job. Just a little slow as limited size intake of produce.
customer_reviews.author: Jav

customer_reviews.title: ... - 3 weeks ago and so far I'm really pleased. We've been juicing lots of apples and have ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this product about 2 - 3 weeks ago and so far I'm really pleased. We've been juicing lots of apples and have probably juiced about 7 gallons of cider so far. We haven't tried juicing anything else yet since we finished up canning all our vegetables. We got this mainly for apples. The machine is quite quiet with little vibration. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have no comparison to other masticating juicers but it seems to work well. My mom has the exact one and has been using it daily for over a year now. Seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Rad

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic juicer - bought one for myself and as a gift for a friend
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING - so glad I bought this. I've researched so many this last year and finally bought this one. I just bought one for a friend as a thank you gift. It works great and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jewelsa

customer_reviews.title: Best juicer for leafy greens
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, high quality and yeilds the most juice from leafy greens. A must have for the green juice lovers!
customer_reviews.author: Raines Family

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it works just seems t0o expensive for what it is. an overpriced dildo than masticates fruits and vegetables
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this juicer for my daughter, who has Crohn's disease. It is easy to use and clean. She used it to make carrot juice, and it did an excellent job. She will definitely be using it a lot for lots of other juices and for food processing. It's a very nice appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this juicer now for over a year and love it! It is quick and easy to use and clean up is a breeze. The juice quality is incredible and delicious. Very happy customer!!! Cant wait to make juices for my little one:-) Highly recommend for juicing and making nut milks as well as berry sorbet! Very reliable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Zareen

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It is super easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It is super easy to clean! Works great. Make sure to cut your veggies small. Wheatgrass in small amounts and cut in half. Otherwise it gets tangled. That's why I rated this with 4 and half stars.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Bornacelli

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Omega Juicer. I have been making amazing juices that I would be paying an arm and leg for at my area juice bars. This is very easy to put together and take apart for cleaning. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my adult son. He enjoys using it. My daughter in law has friends come over and the do juicing gatherings. I've used it for apple and carrot juice and it is addictive. Met my expectations and more
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with this juicer !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did my homework before buying. I read many, many reviews (on different websites) and checked out YouTube videos. I love this juicer. It juices greens and carrots equally well and the pulp is very dry. I have a tip. Juice wet things like cucumbers and apples first. Follow with greens and hard foods like carrots and celery. They will push the soft pulp through the system. I highly recommend this juicer. I have used it almost daily for a month.
customer_reviews.author: S.G.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: not bad. does what it says it would. good for leafy stuff too
customer_reviews.author: Ernie L.

customer_reviews.title: This juicer is very efficient
customer_reviews.text: This Omega really squeezes all the juice out of all the vegetables. The pulp is very dry! I’m very happy with how simple it assembles, clean’s and reassembles.
customer_reviews.author: Israel T. Mccrery

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Quiet when in use, super easy to dissemble and clean. Makes beautiful and delicious juice. This is the best juicer I have ever used. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I will only buy Omega when it comes to masticating juicers and this one fits the bill for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Starjustin

customer_reviews.title: OK for short duration
customer_reviews.text: It does its job well but the motor seems to burn out very quickly. I’ve had this for less than a year and use it once or twice a week, but already I smell burning of motor after juicing for 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jannet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this juicer. It does a fantastic job and is very quiet. Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: F. Dwayne .C

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: I request an 220 walt , that's what I taught I receive. I send it to my mother in Africa. As soon as she put it together and tried to use it the smoke start coming out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Akpe

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I get such a high yield from this juicer and the clean-up is a snap! The base of the juicer takes up about as much space as a toaster on its own, but you'll need to double that when you are actually juicing.
customer_reviews.author: Sassylib

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. Cleanup is not so bad
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Cleanup is not so bad. The problem I have is not being able to register the product warranty. The website listed on the packing slip does not exist on the website. I just hope that the product hold up, otherwise I will be out of money. If anyone reading this review have any information that will help me register my product. please response.
customer_reviews.author: Lady T

customer_reviews.title: Very good juicer
customer_reviews.text: I love this juicier is great for the greens and everything that is hard but I gave it 4 stars because if I use it for orange juice or anything that is soft is not working well I feel that I am wasting my fruits.
customer_reviews.author: Clau

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for vegetables and leafy greens, not so good for apples or softer fruits.
customer_reviews.author: Sandip P.

customer_reviews.title: Only downside is the chute is pretty small so it takes more time to juice
customer_reviews.text: Works well with hard and soft fruits and vegetables. Only downside is the chute is pretty small so it takes more time to juice. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amy N.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing juicer! I owned several juicer in the past ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing juicer! I owned several juicer in the past and this is by far the best. Very easy to clean compared to others of this type. The juicer also make very little noise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: We use this 3 times a week. It does a GREAT job. Heavy duty, yields a lot of juice and easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Pro Help

customer_reviews.title: The way to strain i don't really like, but its a very good product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Sorry to review over a year later, I'm not good with this.
customer_reviews.author: Trisi Williams

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen work horse
customer_reviews.text: Having had this juicer only a few weeks, I am impressed with its toughness. It chews through greens, other vegetables, and fruits. It does leave some pulp, but for me that is a plus. The pulp that is left is a minimum amount and dry. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: ministerquilts

customer_reviews.title: Best investment! Easy to clean and effective juicing of ...
customer_reviews.text: Best investment! Easy to clean and effective juicing of leafy greens and any vegetable I run through it. I still cut them to manageable size pieces. No regrets on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Enclosed Garden

customer_reviews.title: Kicks ass
customer_reviews.text: This masticating juicer is infinitely better than my old centrifuge. It squeezes every bit of juice out of all fruits and veggies. Even green leafy veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Introvertmb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Best investment. It's easy to clean also.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is great. I’ve never had a masticating juicer but this works well and extracts juice well!
customer_reviews.author: Susana Cota

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great machine and the price was decent. I would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Best juicer made.
customer_reviews.text: Great for juicing all manner of vegies and fruit. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Norman Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine a lil bit pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tory

customer_reviews.title: this product works great. Have only had it for about 2 months
customer_reviews.text: So far, this product works great. Have only had it for about 2 months, but juice often. Cleans VERY EASY. Easy to take apart and clean, and easy to put back on.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl M. Tahtinen

customer_reviews.title: What a great juicer. This is a very well built juicer
customer_reviews.text: WOW! What a great juicer. This is a very well built juicer. It really gets the most amount of juice out of fruits and vegetables. I would recommend this juicer to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Franci Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: We bought it to make more green juices for our picky kids. Unfortunately, it didn't work out. We have used ours only a few times and are trying to sell it now. Otherwise, great juices and very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna T.

customer_reviews.title: but easy to do
customer_reviews.text: The juicer works well, though turns slowly. Just need to be careful not to put too much in at a time. Takes a while to clean, but easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Janna N. Kent

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this juicer. Easy to use easy to clean, it's become my favorite tool!
customer_reviews.author: Jill R. Bissell

customer_reviews.title: Pure juice and dry pulp
customer_reviews.text: I have been leading people on juice cleanses for going on 10 years now, and have used everything from $10 yard sale juicers to $2500 Norwalk juicers. This makes very good quality juice, with one of the easiest clean-ups i have seen. However the produce has to be chopped up incredibly small, and it is very time-consuming to make the actual juice. It doesn't pull the produce down the chute like a Greenstar for example. The pulp however is incredibly dry, and the juice very pure. Get a Vertical wide-mouth juicer if you want to save more time with chopping, otherwise this is a great juicer especially at this price range
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dry pulp
customer_reviews.text: Good juicer overall. Very quiet, and the pulp comes out dry. Easy to clean. Once you get the swing of it it's even better.
customer_reviews.author: Mark O'Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This purchase arrived in a timely manner. It was purchased as a gift and was a big hit! worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Trust Your Gut....Go For This One If You're On The Fence!
customer_reviews.text: Half of the key to the success of this juicer is actually reading the manual. The next quarter? Learning how to break it down (it becomes second nature after a few times)? The next fifteen percent? Getting the hang of cleaning it. And the balance? Figuring the order in which the produce (based on tension needed) should be juiced. I hemmed, hawed and waited about 6 months before pulling the trigger on the J8007S. Now that I have it? I should have gotten it much earlier. Trust your gut on this one. Am juicing, breaking the unit down and cleaning it like a Jedi after only a week.
customer_reviews.author: The Broke Socialite

customer_reviews.title: could not be happier. far exceeds my expectations
customer_reviews.text: 1st juicer iv ever bought. did a lot of research, could not be happier. far exceeds my expectations. strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: where if I juice them with my old Champion juicer I just got the wonderful juice. It clogged up after just 4 grapefruit
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this 3 stars because I bought it to use with a the grapefruit we have on our tree. The juice had a bunch of pulp in it and was undrinkable , very bitter, where if I juice them with my old Champion juicer I just got the wonderful juice. It clogged up after just 4 grapefruit, which I cut up into small slices to feed through. Very dissatisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the omega 8007. Very easy to use and very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ilene Morrison

customer_reviews.title: I needed a juicer that could juice wheatgrass and this one does the job just fine. Like other reviews
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this juicer about 3 months ago. I needed a juicer that could juice wheatgrass and this one does the job just fine. Like other reviews, soft fruit does not juice well alone, but I clear the problem up by juicing the softer fruit first then add something with firmer texture, like an apple. I have juiced wheatgrass, sunflower sprouts, broccoli, celery, cucumbers, grapes, apples and strawberries. Some of the pulp does have a bit of juice left in it but for the price, I feel it does a good job and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ladibug21

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Truly enjoying my juicer. Using it 6 times a day!
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: This juicer is awesome! It crushes everything
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is awesome! It crushes everything. Just like many other reviewers stated, it doesn't do the softer fruits and vegetables great but it does them. I just a carrot or a harder vegetable after the soft ones to clear out out.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Newman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my first juicer and I love it! Easy assemble and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Omega 8007
customer_reviews.text: The Omega 8007 is very effective at juicing hard fruits and vegetables such as apples and carrots. Leafy greens is also very good, but softer foods seems to be marginal. Overall very pleased and would recommend to anyone interested in juicing. It is also very easy to clean up and takes only two minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Majanie

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It is very quite machine
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It is very quite machine. I recommend it to anyone. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LIKE a Boss
customer_reviews.text: Great juicer. Takes a little bit more work, but ghe final product is well worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Adams

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!!! I had a Jack La Lane juicer which was ok but took forever to clean. This is easy to use and very easy to clean. Even though the juice stays good for 72 hours with this juicer I find myself taking it out and juicing fresh because it's just so easy. I'm sure that'll change off as the novelty wears off.
customer_reviews.author: Laileanah

customer_reviews.title: easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is fabulous.. easy clean up , very dry pulp which means your getting the best yield .fast delivery from discount jungle too,love the omega 8007, it also juices wheatgrass perfectly :) just have to push through harder fruits and veggies following soft fruits or it will back up.. 15 year warranty too, can't beat it..
customer_reviews.author: kerryanne

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great juicer. Mine states out on the counter because I love using it. I tossed out the cheaper style juicers. I used it to make pasta and the end cap broke, omega quickly sent me an upgraded replacement part with no charge. Impressed with the production and the company
customer_reviews.author: Holly Vavas

customer_reviews.title: Very good juicer
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love this juicer! It is easy to put together and to clean. This product past my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: farah rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: ... an issue it was quickly resolved and I'm 100% satisfied thank you
customer_reviews.text: Once customer service found that I had an issue it was quickly resolved and I'm 100% satisfied thank you
customer_reviews.author: Howard jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, great juice! Very happy with this machine after all my research deciding which one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Julie's Joys

customer_reviews.title: i love this juicer it changed my life to the best
customer_reviews.text: i love this juicer it changed my life to the best ,i realy recomend everyone to have like it 5 stars all the way :)
customer_reviews.author: salim

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Kitchen Couture, for finally shipping me a working, unused, all parts included, juicer! After purchasing through 2 other companies and going through a lot of phone calls with Amazon, you were the only company who provided a product that was worth spending almost $300 on!! I love the Omega juicer, but I'm even more in love with it now that I have a working one! Thanks again for satisfying an unsatisfied customer of other companies!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: This might be a great juicer for someone who does not do much volume
customer_reviews.text: This might be a great juicer for someone who does not do much volume, or use soft fruits. It did not work well for me.
customer_reviews.author: marguerite miller

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It broke almost immediately and the seller doesn’t care about customer service or relations. I’m an older woman and gentle with things and people. But I cannot abide defective products. The few juices that I made before it broke were loaded with pulp despite frequent cleaning. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Gimpy Nogo

customer_reviews.title: Good juicer (for a day, until it broke)
customer_reviews.text: For the first day or so I had this juicer, it was great. Good extraction of juice from a variety of fruits & veggies - plus it was decently easy to clean, as far as juicers go. The juicing drum, however, broke after using it for one day. I was juicing a grapefruit - so nothing overly tough or hard. A chunk of plastic just broke off, and the auger came unseated from the machine. Big juicy mess to clean up. I've returned this juicer since, and will not be re-purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie Marvel

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the heck out of this since I bought it a month ago. It works great. The chute is a bit small but I enjoy practicing my veggie chopping skills so it's no big deal and I save a little time with a few tricks by using (for instance) Persian cucumbers since they fit in the chute without prep. Get yourself a good medium stiffness veggie scrubber and a soft mushroom scrubber and get juicing.
customer_reviews.author: TheGuy

customer_reviews.title: So disappointing!!
customer_reviews.text: I want to return it, but Im too late. It worked good for 2 months and now doesnt work. I am so sad about it.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: I make juice for every day with this
customer_reviews.text: I make about 4 days worth of juice with this at a time, between 7-8 cups. Takes maybe an hour from start to finish, cleaning/washing the veggies, cutting, assembling the juicer, juicing then clean-up. Not bad to get some super healthy drink for half a week. Gets a lot of juice out of everything, and came with an adjustable dial on one of the components for how much pressure it squeezes with. It will leak maybe a teaspoon onto the counter if you either put too much fibrous stuff through it or put the dial to max, but under normal conditions doesn't leak at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tom O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Great performance and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this juicer for a few months, and have been very impressed with the performance. It's very straightforward to use and creates very little mess compared with other juicers (centrifugal type) I've tried. The noise level is decent, and it's not difficult to clean and maintain. I was a bit unsure about spending this much on a juicer, but the performance and features have proven to be well worth the price. Highly recommend this be on your short list if you're looking for a capable, but simple to use slow juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Comdet

customer_reviews.title: Good product - recommended
customer_reviews.text: I use it a lot and it seems to work very well. It is best with leafy things, then hard things like carrots and beet roots, and can struggle a bit with soft fruits and vegetables. No juicer does everything perfectly, but I've been using it almost every day for 2 months and overall am very happy with it. There are a lot of parts to wash so that must be accounted for in how much time it will take to do the juicing.
customer_reviews.author: Juliaah

customer_reviews.title: sorry
customer_reviews.text: this juicer is fine for juicing vegies but when it comes to fruit forget it, it backs up in juicer and takes for ever to juice. I usually have to take it apart 2 or 3 times to finish. its to exspensive to be doing this. if I could return it I would.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Overall
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Love that it can juice all the way to wheat grass, so we don't need to buy a separate juicer for that. No complaints as it is easy to clean and makes great juice. Only complaint is it's a bit loud and you have to put small pieces in, instead of big chunks, so it takes a bit of time to get the amount you want.
customer_reviews.author: Esper

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Better than the Hamilton beach centrifugal loud juicer I had previously! This one is so much quieter not so good with softer fruits best to juice a harder fruit or veggie and go back and forth between the softer fruits! Also if you are juicing celery I try to save till the end because the stringy part of celery gets all twisted up on the end! You need to cut of the produce a little smaller too because the tube is smaller than my other juicer but there is so much more that I want to use it for I haven't tried fruit sorbets yet or nut butters or nut milks!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer for leafy greens and dry veggies like carrots
customer_reviews.text: Great juicer for leafy greens and dry veggies like carrots, broccoli, etc. I didn't like how it works with juicy fruits, I had to stop the juicer every 5-10 min to clean the screen... Got another juicer (vertical single auger) and very happy with it, even though the yield is ~10% lower.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Best juicer for greens!
customer_reviews.text: Great juicer for greens and citrus. It takes a lot longer than a centrifugal juicer but worth it. Plus you can make sorbets and other frozen treats.
customer_reviews.author: goldencam

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this Omega Juicer
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this Omega Juicer! I was using Jack Lalane to see how diligent I would be in juicing. The Omega Juicer extracts a significant amount more liquid and the pulp is incredibly dry in comparison. It is quiet and so easy to clean. So glad I invested into a better juicer. I have yet to experiment with the other attachments that you can make with it, but they are all a bonus to me since I mainly wanted it for vegetable juices. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ZZ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome juicer!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this juicer!! I use it a few times a week and it does a good job and isn't too hard to clean. I have had it for about 6 months and the little rubber piece on the juicing screen broke but I called Omega and I just had to email them a picture of the broken piece and they are mailing me a new part (I had to pay $9 shipping). Still worth it though and great customer service! Again, this juicier is fabulous!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tami

product_meta.title: Omega Slow Masticating Juicer, Silver (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: Omega's Nutrition Systems are "masticating-style" juice extractors and more! A masticating juicer juices at low speeds of 80 RPM minimizing heat build-up and oxidation. The auger system forces produce into a tight chamber, grinding and pressing the food to squeeze out the juice from items as fine as wheatgrass and leafy vegetables. With a Nutrition System you can also make all-natural nut butters, baby food, soy/nut milks, pasta and a variety of healthy snacks.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars319 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
